tasks.name: Research Core Economic Theory
tasks.description: Conduct thorough research on the specified economic theory, gathering relevant background information and contemporary applications.

tasks.name: Data Collection and Analysis
tasks.description: Identify and collect pertinent economic data sets, then perform preliminary analysis to identify trends or correlations relevant to the assignment.

tasks.name: Draft Report/Essay
tasks.description: Write a comprehensive draft of the assignment, incorporating research findings and data analysis, ensuring a clear thesis and supporting arguments.

tasks.name: Review and Refine Content
tasks.description: Critically review the draft for logical flow, accuracy, coherence, and adherence to assignment guidelines, making necessary revisions.

tasks.name: Final Proofreading and Submission
tasks.description: Perform a final check for grammar, spelling, punctuation, and formatting errors before submitting the completed economics assignment.
